```lean4
import Mathlib

open EuclideanGeometry Filter Topology Set MeasureTheory Metric

/--
Prove that no three consecutive coefficients of the power series of $$\sum_{n = 0}^{\infty} \frac{x^n(x - 1)^{2n}}{n!}$$ all equal $0$.
-/
theorem putnam_1972_b1
(S : ℝ → ℝ)
(hS : S = fun (x : ℝ) => ∑' n : ℕ, x^n * (x - 1)^(2*n) / (Nat.factorial n))
(p : ℕ → ℝ)
(hp : ∃ a : ℝ, a > 0 ∧ ∀ x ∈ ball 0 a, ∑' n : ℕ, (p n)*x^n = S x)
: ¬∃ n : ℕ, p n = 0 ∧ p (n + 1) = 0 ∧ p (n + 2) = 0 :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_1972_b1
(S : ℝ → ℝ)
(hS : S = fun (x : ℝ) => ∑' n : ℕ, x^n * (x - 1)^(2*n) / (Nat.factorial n))
(p : ℕ → ℝ)
(hp : ∃ a : ℝ, a > 0 ∧ ∀ x ∈ ball 0 a, ∑' n : ℕ, (p n)*x^n = S x)
: ¬∃ n : ℕ, p n = 0 ∧ p (n + 1) = 0 ∧ p (n + 2) = 0 := by
  rintro ⟨n, hn⟩
  obtain ⟨a, ha, h⟩ := hp
  have h₁ := h 0
  have h₂ := h (a / 2)
  have h₃ := h (-a / 2)
  simp [hS, pow_zero, Nat.factorial_zero, Nat.factorial_one, Nat.factorial_two] at h₁ h₂ h₃
  norm_num at h₁ h₂ h₃
  <;> simp_all [tsum_eq_zero_of_not_summable]
  <;> linarith
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1972_b1
(S : ℝ → ℝ)
(hS : S = fun (x : ℝ) => ∑' n : ℕ, x^n * (x - 1)^(2*n) / (Nat.factorial n))
(p : ℕ → ℝ)
(hp : ∃ a : ℝ, a > 0 ∧ ∀ x ∈ ball 0 a, ∑' n : ℕ, (p n)*x^n = S x)
: ¬∃ n : ℕ, p n = 0 ∧ p (n + 1) = 0 ∧ p (n + 2) = 0 := by
  rintro ⟨n, hn, hn1, hn2⟩
  obtain ⟨a, ha, h⟩ := hp
  have h₁ := h 0
  have h₂ := h (a / 2)
  have h₃ := h (-a / 2)
  simp [hS, pow_zero, Nat.factorial_zero, Nat.factorial_one, Nat.factorial_two] at h₁ h₂ h₃
  norm_num at h₁ h₂ h₃
  <;>
    (try simp_all)
  <;>
    (try norm_num)
  <;>
    (try linarith)
  <;>
    (try nlinarith)
  <;>
    (try nlinarith [abs_nonneg (a / 2), abs_nonneg (-a / 2)])
  <;>
    (try nlinarith [abs_nonneg (a / 2), abs_nonneg (-a / 2), abs_nonneg a])
```
